interfaces

Interface Net

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NetworkImpl

    public interface Net

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createServer()
      Create the server.
      void disconnect(java.io.Serializable payload, java.util.Collection<java.net.InetAddress> knownIPs)
      Stop all interactions between user and network and notifies the network that the user has been disconnected.
      void requestDownload(java.util.stream.Stream<java.net.InetAddress> ownerIps, java.lang.String musicHash)
      Sends a request to download the distant file identified by the given hash from differents IPs (list of users who have the mp3).
      void sendToUser(java.io.Serializable payload, java.net.InetAddress ipDest)
      Sends a message containing the string payload to the given ip.
      void sendToUsers(java.io.Serializable payload, java.util.stream.Stream<java.net.InetAddress> ipsDest)
      Sends a message containing the string payload to the given ipS.

    • Method Detail

      • sendToUser

        void sendToUser(java.io.Serializable payload,
                java.net.InetAddress ipDest)
        Sends a message containing the string payload to the given ip. If the current user is not connected then it conects it.
        Parameters:
        payload - content of the message
        ipDest - ip address of the receiver

      • sendToUsers

        void sendToUsers(java.io.Serializable payload,
                 java.util.stream.Stream<java.net.InetAddress> ipsDest)
        Sends a message containing the string payload to the given ipS. If the current user is not connected then it conects it.
        Parameters:
        payload - content of the message
        ipsDest - ip addresses of the receivers

      • requestDownload

        void requestDownload(java.util.stream.Stream<java.net.InetAddress> ownerIps,
                     java.lang.String musicHash)
        Sends a request to download the distant file identified by the given hash from differents IPs (list of users who have the mp3). The list is used to manage errors
        Parameters:
        ownerIps - ips where the music can be downloaded
        musicHash - hash of the music to download

      • disconnect

        void disconnect(java.io.Serializable payload,
                java.util.Collection<java.net.InetAddress> knownIPs)
        Stop all interactions between user and network and notifies the network that the user has been disconnected.
        Parameters:
        payload - data to inform the network we are disconnected
        knownIPs - known ips in the network

      • createServer

        void createServer()
        Create the server.
